name: mobile-ekyc-dependencies
description: Additional dependencies required for eKYC integration

scripts.install-ekyc-deps: npm install expo-document-picker expo-file-system react-native-zip-archive react-native-xml2js react-native-fs

notes: These dependencies are required for eKYC integration:
- expo-document-picker: For selecting UIDAI zip files
- expo-file-system: For reading and processing files
- react-native-xml2js: For parsing UIDAI XML data
Install types with: npm run install-ekyc-types
